meta.description: Language labels for the Tag Cloud extension in the Backend

languageKey.label: Generally
jQueryNoConflict (Default: true)
JavaScript in header/ footer (Default: header)
sphere
sphere
Css Id (Required)
Width (Default: 300)
Height (Default: 300)
tt_news Category menu page (Required)
Recursion | get subcategories from selected below (Default: 3)
Categories Selection | Shows only categories and their subcategories if they has visible news. (Required)
Visualisation

Shape | The shape of the cloud. Currently supported are sphere, hcylinder for a cylinder that starts off horizontal, vcylinder for a cylinder that starts off vertical, hring for a horizontal circle and vring for a vertical circle. (Default: sphere)
sphere
sphere
sphere
sphere
sphere
textColour | Colour of the tag text. (Default: #ff99ff)
textHeight | Height of the tag text font (in pixels). (Default: 15)
txtOpt | Text optimisation, converts text tags to images for better performance. (Default: active)
active
inactive
backgroundColor | Backgroundcolor for the container. (Default: transparent)
txtScale | Scaling factor of text when converting to image in txtOpt mode. (Default: 2)
shadow | Colour of the shadow behind each tag. (Default: #000000)
shadowBlur | Amount of tag shadow blurring, in pixels. (Default: 0)
shadowOffset | X and Y offset of the tag shadow, in pixels. (Default: [0,0])
outlineColour | Colour of the active tag highlight. (Default: #ffff99)

outlineMethod | Type of highlight to use. Options are: outline for an outline at the same depth as the active tag, classic for the old-style outline on top of all tags, block for a solid block around the active tag, colour to change the colour of the text or image of the current tag to the outlineColour value, none for no highlighting at all. (Default: outline)
outline
classic
block
colour
none
outlineThickness | Thickness of outline in pixels. (Default: 2)
outlineOffset | Distance of outline from text, in pixels. This also increases the size of the active area around the tag. (Default: 5)
maxBrightness | Brightness (opacity) of tags at front of cloud. (0.0-1.0). (Default: 1.0)
minBrightness | Brightness (opacity) of tags at back of cloud. (0.0-1.0). (Default: 0.1)
Animation
fadeIn | Time to fade in tags at start, in milliseconds. (Default: 0)
initial | Starting rotation speed, with horizontal and vertical values as an array, e.g. [0.8,-0.3]. Values are multiplied by maxSpeed. (Default: empty)
animTiming | The animation timing function for use with the RotateTag and TagToFront functions. The values available are "Smooth" and "Linear". (Default: Smooth)
Smooth
Linear
maxSpeed | Maximum speed of rotation. (Default: 0.05)
minSpeed | Minimum speed of rotation when mouse leaves canvas. (Default: 0.0)
interval | Interval between animation frames, in milliseconds. (Default: 20)
depth | Controls the perspective (0.0-1.0). (Default: 0.5)
pulsateTo | Pulsate outline to this opacity (0.0-1.0). (Default: 1.0)
pulsateTo | Pulse rate, in seconds per beat. (Default: 3)
Weight
Set to true to turn on weighting of tags. (Default: deactivated)
weightMode | Weight Mode (Default: size)
size
color
both
weightSize | Multiplier for adjusting the size of tags when using a weight mode of size or both. (Default: 1.0)
weightGradient | The colour gradient used for colouring tags when using a weight mode of colour or both. (Default: {0:'#f00', 0.33:'#ff0', 0.66:'#0f0', 1:'#00f'} )
weightSizeMin | Minimum font size when weighted sizing is enabled. (Default: empty)
weightSizeMax | Maximum font size when weighted sizing is enabled. (Default: empty)
Offsets, radius and stretch
radiusX | Initial size of cloud from centre to sides. (Default: 1)
radiusY | Initial size of cloud from centre to top and bottom. (Default: 1)
radiusZ | Initial size of cloud from centre to front and back. (Default: 1)
offsetX | Offsets the centre of the cloud horizontally. (measured in pixels). (Default: 0)
offsetY | Offsets the centre of the cloud vertically (measured in pixels). (Default: 0)
stretchX | Stretch or compress the cloud horizontally. (Default: 1)
stretchY | Stretch or compress the cloud vertically. (Default: 1)
Usability
dragControl | When enabled, cloud moves when dragged instead of based on mouse position. (Default: inactive)
active
inactive
dragThreshold | The number of pixels that the cursor must move to count as a drag instead of a click. (Default: 4)
decel | Deceleration rate when mouse leaves canvas. (Default: 0.95)
freezeActive | Set to active to pause movement when a tag is highlighted. (Default: inactive)
active
inactive
freezeDecel | Set to active to decelerate when highlighted tags freeze instead of stopping suddenly. (Default: inactive)
active
inactive
frontSelect | Set to active to prevent selection of tags at back of cloud. (Default: inactive)
active
inactive
noSelect | Set to active to prevent the selection of tags. (Default: inactive)
active
inactive
noMouse | Set to active to prevent any mouse interaction. The initial option must be used to animate the cloud, otherwise it will be motionless. (Default: inactive)
active
inactive

lock | Limits rotation of the cloud using the mouse. A value of "x" limits rotation to the x-axis, "y" limits rotation to the y-axis. A value of "xy" will prevent the cloud rotating in response to the mouse - the cloud will only move if the initial option is used to give it a starting speed. (Default: empty)
wheelZoom | Enables zooming the cloud in and out using the mouse wheel or scroll gesture. (Default: active)
active
inactive
zoom | Adjusts the relative size of the tag cloud in the canvas. Larger values will zoom into the cloud, smaller values will zoom out. (Default: 1.0)
zoomStep | The amount that the zoom is changed by with each movement of the mouse wheel. (Default: 0.05)
zoomMax | Maximum zoom value. (Default: 3.0)
zoomMin | Minimum zoom value. (Default: 0.3)
clickToFront | If set to a number, the selected tag will move to the front in this many milliseconds before activating. (Default: empty)
reverse | Set to true to reverse direction of movement relative to mouse position.(Default: inactive)
active
inactive
